Hypothesis 1, on the other hand, doesn't provide enough information to determine what kind of "source of wealth" Tom had contact with. It could be something positive, like a treasure trove of educational resources, or something negative, like a harmful or inappropriate material. As a parent, my primary concern is always the safety and well-being of my children, and I would want to err on the side of caution when it comes to their exposure to new or unknown materials.
